original_text: And he set all the people as a guard for the king, every man with his weapon in his hand, from the south side of the house to the north side of the house, around the altar and the house.
korean_text: 또 백성들에게 각각 손에 무기를 잡고 왕을 호위하되 성전 오른쪽에서부터 성전 왼쪽까지 제단과 성전 곁에 서게 하고

sentences.original_text: And he set all the people as a guard for the king,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 왕을 위해 모든 백성을 경비병으로 세우고,

sentences.original_text: every man with his weapon in his hand,
from the south side of the house to the north side of the house,
around the altar and the house.
